title: First Blog Post
summary: HTML is the backbone of web development. Learn the basics of structuring content with tags, elements, and attributes to create your first webpage.

title: Second Blog Post
summary: Embark on your coding journey with essential tips for beginners. Choose a language, understand basic programming concepts, and find resources to kickstart your learning.

title: Third Blog Post
summary: Visual Studio Code is a powerful code editor. Discover how to use its features, extensions, and shortcuts to enhance your coding productivity.
